title: Interpretation of a dream about a woman drowning in a dream

When you see a single girl drowning in a dream, it may be a sign of a financial crisis, and God knows best. When you see the car sinking and people do not escape from it, it may be a sign of staying away from sins and transgressions, God willing. If the dreamer sees the car sinking in a dream, this may indicate To loss of opportunities, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees someone escaping from drowning in a dream, this may mean that she gets rid of anxiety and sadness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. title: Interpretation of seeing someone crying in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: But does crying in the world of dreams bring comfort and good news to a person, or vice versa? We will see special details about the interpretation of this vision from your website gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing someone crying in a dream about a single girl. When a single girl dreams that she sees someone crying with her to scream in her dream. Indicating to her that this person is suffering from something, or may It may be in some calamity or problem, or it may be an epidemic, and God knows best. Seeing a familiar person crying next to an unmarried girl is a sign that he will achieve what he wants and desires, God willing. The girl who sits next to the one who was crying and is known to her, symbolizes that her heart is pure white. She is a loyal and good girl. The dead person who comes to the unmarried girl in her sleep and cries. This dream is very important because this deceased wants to give him alms and pray for him constantly, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When an unmarried girl sees herself crying in a dream. It is a sign of... The difficult problems she will face in his life, especially if the crying is over a dead person. And if she was the one who was crying under the raindrops, then tell her the call that God Almighty will respond to. Seeing the rain and crying under it carries different signs. One of them is that she will witness pleasant circumstances for her, and her condition will change. From sadness to joy and stability, God willing. Seeing a girl crying without a sound. It says that everyone trusts her because she has good qualities. She will also recover from the disease, God willing, and the problems in her life will go away by God’s will. In the case of an unmarried woman crying over a dead person, this symbolizes a need For an unmarried woman, crying over the dead in a dream can be good news. To her about what she will obtain in her professional and academic life and her success that God has recommended. And if she cries without tears in the dream for an unmarried woman, this is a good sign of her approaching marriage and the happiness that fills her from this love relationship. If she is smacked with tears, then she has no praise. It symbolizes To her inability to take advantage of the opportunities that come her way, and her failure to succeed and reach her dreams. See also: Interpretation of dreams for crying with heartburnInterpretation of seeing someone crying in a dream for a married womanIf the husband comes to the husband in her dream and cries while he is sad, this is a sign for her that happiness It dominates their married life. Seeing a father crying for his daughter in a dream for a married woman is a sign that he will receive abundant money if she feels sorry for him in a dream. And God knows best. When she sees an unknown person crying in a dream, this is a sign that she is a woman who is not afraid of anything and everything. A married woman crying in her dream symbolizes her desire to change her situation to a better place than it is. It may be a sign for her and her husband that their situation It will be better. If a married woman cries in a dream only without lamenting or anything else. It is a sign that she has a pregnancy that she will be blessed with, and it will be more rewarding.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing the death of Ibn Sirin’s father?

preview.html:
Interpretation of the vision of the death of the father. Often a person may dream of the death of his father in a dream, and he may fear the interpretation of this vision and seeks. Interpretation of the vision of the death of the father. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of this vision? Interpretation of the vision of the death of the father of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of the dream of the father’s death is inspired by the imagination of the subconscious mind. He explained Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of a dream about the death of a father is the result of extreme fatigue that a person suffers from during his work day. Ibn Sirin interprets the dream about the death of a father by the importance of the father to the son and his great love for him. Ibn Sirin explains that a dead person in a dream has a long life in reality. The interpretation of seeing a death varies. Father from one person to another very often, as Ibn Sirin explains that seeing the death of one’s father in a dream indicates that the father is suffering from some problems in his life. If one dreams of the death of one’s father and sees a lot of sadness, pain, and crying, this means that the person will experience some psychological pressure. He will experience some cases of severe depression and that he will go through some bad events.
ZOE. As Ibn Sirin said, if a person sees the death of his father in a dream without any kind of sadness and sorrow appearing on him, this indicates that God Almighty will grant him success in his life. In the interpretation of a dream about the death of a father, if a person sees in a dream that he is crying as a result of the death His father, this means that he will go through a stage of weakness, but he will overcome it quickly. In another interpretation of seeing the father’s death in a dream, God protects the dreamer and grants him success throughout his life. But if he sees that his father has died and in reality he is not afflicted with diseases, this is evidence that his condition It changes from good to worse. In the interpretation of a person who saw that his father died in a dream when he was a young child, this is evidence that his father loves him and gives him many gifts. Seeing the death of a dead father in a dream, but no signs of sadness, shroud, or consolation appear, this indicates On health and longevity. If he sees the father dying and then returns to life, this indicates that the father committed sins and transgressions. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a married father through the site is different. We interpret Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a married woman seeing her father’s death in a dream. Ibn Sirin interpreted this dream by saying that his daughter She is a good son and God grants her good and blessed offspring. If a married woman sees the death of her father in a dream, this means that her father has planted a good seed for her and great sustenance. The interpretation of seeing the death of a person’s father varies from man to woman. Ibn Sirin interpreted this dream as having a great disagreement. Between father and son, which leads to a conflict between them, and that he will be surprised by important news that he did not know about before that will change his life for the worse. But if there is love and tenderness between them, then this indicates great love for his son and that God will reward him with the best reward. Interpretation of seeing his father’s death in a dream for a man. If a man sees his father’s death in a dream and a dispute occurs between them, this indicates that he will learn a big secret that he does not know. If a man dreams In a dream, his father is preparing to travel, this indicates that his life is approaching, and if his father dies, this indicates goodness and blessing for him if his father is satisfied with him before his death. Seeing a man

Seeing a man

title: Interpretation of a waterfall in a dream: Seeing a waterfall in a dream

preview.html: A dream of a waterfall for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman: either entering the waterfall, jumping, drowning, swimming, or drinking according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a waterfall in a dream: If you dream of a waterfall in a dream, this foretells that you will secure the symptoms of your desires, and your wealth will meet your progress steadily. Seeing waterfalls in a dream generally indicates The fulfillment of desires and desires that the dreamer seeks to achieve. The dream interpretation of a waterfall in a dream varies depending on the details of the dreamer’s vision of the shape and size of the waterfall in the dream. Whoever sees a waterfall in a dream, this symbolizes a person with a big, brave heart. We wish you success, blessings, and goodness that the dreamer brings to those around him. Vision. Waterfalls in a dream express the appearance of a specific wave that may be political or social. As for seeing waterfalls from waterfalls, it indicates a sudden, radical change in the dreamer’s life, a wave of change, or a wave of revolutions. And whoever sees a huge, large waterfall in his dream, this means that something good will happen soon. , a lot of success and fulfillment of all your wishes and desires that you seek to achieve in the future and that you dream about. The person who sees a waterfall is characterized by generosity, honesty, and courage. If you dream of a waterfall, this foretells that you will guarantee the symptoms of your desires and your wealth will respond firmly. Seeing waterfalls in a dream shows many desires and dreams that a person wants in reality and that these desires and desires will come true, God willing. In general, seeing waterfalls in the water It indicates goodness and goodness, and seeing a waterfall in a dream means success and inner self-realization. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a waterfall in a dream as evidence of Islam, great knowledge and superiority, and water in a dream also indicates prosperity, peace and prosperity. Seeing waterfalls in a dream indicates that the dreamer is a lucky person. He loves helping others and has a big heart, and the dreamer is a person rich in all good qualities. The interpretation of seeing waterfalls in a dream means that the dreamer is a generous person who brings blessings to everyone around him and wherever he goes. Waterfalls in a dream means that the dreamer is rich in all aspects, morally, spiritually, emotionally, psychologically and materially. Whoever sees waterfalls in his dream will be a successful businessman of great importance, as he has great ability to be a good manager. Seeing a waterfall in a dream means that the dreamer will be a manager who will attract the attention of others with his success and will have a big contract in the near future. Whoever sees waterfalls in his dream will live His life is healthy and happy and he will not suffer from any financial or health problems. Whoever sees in his dream that he is looking at waterfalls, he will undertake a business in which he will succeed for a long time, or the dreamer will succeed in the business in which he has been working for a long time. Anyone who dreams of jumping over waterfalls is a sign However, the coming days will be comfortable financially and morally, and the dreamer will gain great wealth and be freed from all his problems and worries. Whoever dreams that he is swimming in waterfalls, the dream indicates that all his problems will disappear and his wounds will disappear, as he will live in new emotional relationships and enter into new and exciting stages and find solutions. . For issues that concerned him and that he thought he would

title: The most important and accurate 60 interpretations of seeing an old friend in a dream

preview.html: Seeing an old friend in a dream A friend is a bond and security in life if he is a loyal person, and most often he is like a brother who was not born by the mother, but what about seeing an old friend in a dream? What are the implications and interpretations of the vision? This is what we will discuss together in this article with the Egyptian website. Seeing an old friend in a dream Dreaming of an old friend indicates joy and happiness in life, as well as the dreamer's need to meet this close friend. Seeing a friend expresses the presence of some things that are on the dreamer's mind and he wants to talk about them, but if he sees his friend in good health, this means that he will visit him soon in reality. Seeing a close friend smiling means that you will soon hear good news, while sitting with a childhood friend indicates the dreamer's desire to return to his old behaviors and his desire for positive change and to move away from his negative actions. Seeing childhood friends is a psychological vision, and Miller said that people who always see childhood friends in a dream are lonely people and are always looking for themselves and want to talk and show what is in their hearts. Seeing a friend in a high and lofty place is good news for the dreamer that he will obtain a prestigious position, and it also expresses the emergence of many positive changes and improvements in life and achieving promotion and an increase in livelihood soon. Seeing a sick friend is an expression of the dreamer's fatigue and excessive exhaustion, and it may be an expression of the friend's suffering and the need for the viewer to stand by him. If If you saw in your dream that friends have turned into animals, this is undesirable and portends the spread of hostility between them, while quarreling shows love and affection. Seeing friends saying goodbye is an expression of separation and distance in reality, while dreaming of betrayal by a friend expresses anxiety and psychological tension in the dreamer, as it is a psychological vision. Dreaming that you are shaking hands with close friends indicates friendly and strong relationships and also expresses reconciliation between quarrels. Seeing an old friend in a dream for Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said that whoever sees an old friend putting his hand on the dreamer is a vision indicating that he will betray him, but he will return to him and forgive him in the end. Seeing friends in the form of animals indicates the entry of enemies and the emergence of strife and disputes between the fortuneteller and friends, which leads to a disturbance in the friendship between them. Seeing an old friend tired, exhausted and with a bad appearance means fatigue that will affect the dreamer, while seeing a friend wearing dark clothes means sadness, anxiety and loss. Seeing an old friend in a dream about singles Dream interpreters say about this vision that it indicates that she hears good news and that something important will happen in her life that will change her a lot. On the other hand, if a woman is not A married woman who has been previously tied up and sees the appearance of an old friend, this means that she will return to her first love again. Seeing a beloved friend is desirable and indicates the achievement of a desire and a precious goal that the girl seeks. Dreaming of a friend suffering from distress or crying indicates that this person needs help, and the vision also expresses the girl’s suffering from worries

On the other hand, if an unmarried woman was previously restrained and sees the appearance of an old friend, this means that she will return to her first love Once again. Seeing a beloved friend is desirable and indicates the fulfillment of a desire and a valuable goal that the girl seeks. To dream of a friend suffering from distress or crying indicates that this person needs help, and the vision also expresses the girl’s suffering from worries.

Seeing white dogs is evidence of the presence of loyal friends in this girl's life who provide her with advice and counsel. A gray dog ​​in a girl's dream is evidence of the injustice she is exposed to. Dogs in a pregnant woman's dream may indicate the greed of some people who want to seize their money. title: Interpretation of a dream about ostrich eggs by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing ostrich eggs in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a large egg, eating an ostrich egg, breaking ostrich eggs, and laying eggs for Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. And others: Ostrich eggs in a dream are among the beautiful and mysterious dreams that we see in our dreams, and they carry for us many important meanings and associations that reach the dreamer. The ostrich is one of the beautiful and well-known domestic birds in our lives. It is distinguished by its large size and is the largest bird on the face of the planet, so it is one of the dreams. Which is difficult to see in a dream due to the lack of dealing with ostriches in public life in zoos. Or the places where ostriches are raised in various Arab countries. The famous and international dream interpreter Ibn Sirin explained to us in various interpretations that seeing ostrich eggs in a dream has very important effects and signs that need a proper interpretation through our knowledge of the details of the dream. Interpretation of ostrich eggs in a dream Seeing ostrich eggs In a dream, it means reuniting the family, saving money, and making things easier, and it was said: ostrich eggs. She announces her daughters. The appearance of ostrich eggs in a dream means that the dreamer will enjoy the love of a very beautiful girl. When you dream of buying ostrich eggs, this indicates the presence of a woman or providing a daughter if you are married, and it also indicates a prolongation of life. When you see yourself opening ostrich eggs, this is a bad omen because it indicates Being wronged or committing a sin that angers God Almighty. Seeing an ostrich laying eggs in a dream indicates the extent of the bliss that will come or the provision of good, long-awaited children. If the dreamer breaks ostrich eggs in a dream and the chick enters the egg, then he must sacrifice the camel’s virginity for every egg, and femininity is not a requirement. He broke ostrich eggs in a dream and the chick did not move in it, so he had to slaughter the stallion according to the number of eggs. He saw him breaking ostrich eggs and killing an ostrich chick, then slaughtering the same number of camels. What was narrated by Ali bin Jaafar - in the Sahih - on the authority of his brother, the ancient Imam, peace be upon him, who said: I asked him about a man. Breaking ostrich eggs into eggs. And there were chicks that came down, so he said: Every chick that moves with the camel must be slaughtered in the abyss. Seeing ostrich eggs in a dream indicates good and abundant livelihood, and it is a symbol of children and shows their good and good deeds, and it may symbolize a loyal and righteous wife, and God knows best. Interpretation of ostrich eggs in a dream By Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said that ostrich eggs in a dream indicate offspring from daughters. An ostrich egg in a dream symbolizes a great blessing and abundance of livelihood that will last and continue, God willing. Eating ostrich eggs in a dream indicates a large amount of money, profit, or inheritance. Boiled ostrich eggs in a dream also indicate Easy profit and easy money. Fried ostrich eggs in a dream indicate profit in which there will be stress, hardship, and competition. Seeing a raw ostrich egg in a dream is money that is threatened with loss, and God knows best. Seeing ostrich eggs in a dream is a sign that good is imminent for the person in the vision at that time. Who sees it? Ostrich eggs in his dream are an indication of the upcoming broad life of the visionary during a

title: Interpretation of basilisk in a dream

preview.html: There are many clues related to the interpretation of basilisk in a dream. Any meaning does not mean that something will happen in reality. In the following lines of the encyclopedia, we will present in detail the meanings of a dream about basilisk in a dream for single people, married women, and men. Interpretation of the basilisk in a dream by Ibn Sirin. There are many different interpretations of the basilisk. In general, the interpretation of basilisk in a dream means that something will happen in reality. Its vision is one of the beautiful visions that express the appearance of beautiful and happy things in the life of the dreamer, and according to the sheikh of the translator Ibn Sirin, he sees the following: If a person sees himself planting basil seeds in his home, this is a sign of strength and power. As for the man who places basil on his chest, this means that God He was blessed with a good wife. Whoever sees in his dream that he is in a place where there is basil, greenery, and water, then this is a sign that problems and worries will stop. One of the unpleasant dreams is that the dreamer cuts basil, and it is a sign that worries and sorrows will affect him. If you dream of a deceased person giving basil leaves This is good news for the dreamer with justice and guidance. If the dreamer sees himself sitting in a royal position, this is a sign that someone is talking behind his back. If the dreamer sees that he is planting basil, this is good news that God Almighty will give him a good ending with his good deeds. There are connotations and interpretations Different for single, married and pregnant women, and here, dear reader, are some of those interpretations: Interpretation of seeing basil in a dream for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried girl with basil in her hand indicates that God will bless her with kindness and that she will find the right person to propose to her. If the girl sees that she is planting basil, this is a sign of She will succeed in her studies and in her work if she works. As for the unmarried woman who saw herself preparing food and using basil while she was going through a crisis or problem, this is good news that the problems she suffers from in her life are over. Seeing the dreamer picking basil is a good sign. It will affect the dreamer and she will succeed in her life. As for unpleasant interpretations of dreams, and the dream of the basilisk arriving in heaven, this indicates that a good person known to the monarch will die soon, and God knows the future. But if the dreamer sees an unpleasant smell of basil, this is a warning that sad events will occur. Interpretation of a single person’s vision of royal basil in a dream: If an unmarried person sees basil in a dream, this is good news that he will get married soon. But if he sees himself carrying basil in his dream, this is a sign that he will fulfill his dreams and desires in the near future, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about basil for a married woman is one of the most promising visions For a married woman to dream of basil, because it indicates pregnancy and that God is granting her a beautiful child. If a married woman dreams that she is carrying basil, this means that she is living a happy married life with her husband and children and indicates the stability of her financial situation. Interpretation of basil in a dream for a pregnant woman and among the praiseworthy visions is that A pregnant woman sees that she is carrying a branch of basil, then this is good news that she will give birth to a handsome male child who will have good morals and purity.

title: Interpretation of a dragon in a dream - To see a dragon in a dream

preview.html: Contents: The meaning of the dragon for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a married and single man, either in green or black, chasing me, chasing me, attacking me, flying, dating, fire, dead and dying a big little dragon and rising and riding and others by Ibn Sirin And Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of a dragon in a dream. A dragon in a dream is a fearful tyrannical ruler or a burning fire. If a sick person sees a dragon, this indicates his death. And if a woman gives birth to a dragon in a dream, she will give birth to a tall boy, because the dragon crawls when he walks. And whoever dreams as if a dragon is dragging him through the water is torment. Power or torment from Almighty God or from his Lord harms him. If he sees that he has turned into a dragon, then his life will be long and he will gain power, and if he eats dragon meat, he will get money from the king. Perhaps the dragon has shown a long period of time because of its duration, so if he sees it coming towards him Without harm, or giving him something or speaking to him in a free language, this indicates a lot of good that will happen to him. Whoever sees in his dream a dragon changing, and a man from it, this indicates an army of jinn, three or four heads until it reaches seven heads, and each head brings misfortune and evil. If he becomes seven-headed, he will have no equal in his hatred and hostility. Whoever dreams that he is the king of a dragon, then he will win over a person without reason. If a pregnant woman sees that she has given birth to a dragon, then she will give birth to a son, or a glorious orator with a sharp tongue, or the son of a priest, or a soothsayer, or an evil sinner, or a thief. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the vision of the dragon. Although the dragon is a fictional and legendary creature, man has mentioned it for thousands of years, and therefore stories and legends have dealt with it since the era before Christ. Ibn Sirin mentioned this interpretation. Seeing in a dream. He said that seeing someone in his dream as if he were a dragon could indicate longevity or the power, influence, and prestige that he acquires. With his life, he hides and hides his hostility towards him, and the multi-headed dragon symbolizes a man of many tricks and many deceptions, and seeing a dragon in a dream blowing and extinguishing the fire is repulsive because it foretells misfortunes and wars, and it is repulsive to see it in the dream of a traveler or a sick person. Seeing a green dragon in a dream, in general, is considered the color Green in a dream is a sign of goodness and a call for optimism, even if one dreams of a wild or predatory animal, and seeing a green dragon in a person’s dream indicates that the dreamer controls negative feelings, emotions, and unlimited positive thinking. As for seeing a green dragon in a dream of an unmarried girl or woman, it is as if The green dragon attacks and chases her, this reflects the stage she is currently going through, a stage full of ambition. In revolution or anger in general, seeing a black dragon in a dream is in contrast to the color, seeing green in a dream as the black color in dreams shows everything that is bad and also shows power and influence. A mule, hatred and envy of others, where the dreamer is the focus of others' eyes because of his strength, influence, ambition, power, beauty, luck and money. The black dragon carries within it a grave danger.

title: Interpretation of a dream about walking in a wheelchair

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about walking in a wheelchair in a dream: If we want to know the interpretation of a dream about walking in a wheelchair in a dream and we find that it is one of the dreams that some people want to know the interpretation of, let us find a departure from the interpretations of working scholars for this dream, and the reader should know that those in charge of the site do not With interpretations, but they preserve the interpretations of some scholars. Interpretation of a dream about walking in a wheelchair in a dream Walking in a wheelchair in a dream can be a sign of the ability of the visionary to achieve his goals and aspirations. Whoever sees in his dream that he is walking in a wheelchair quickly, it could be a sign of Positive changes occur in the dreamer's life during those days. A person dreaming that he was walking in a wheelchair could be a sign of happy events that will come to the dreamer during that time. A person dreaming of walking in a wheelchair could be a sign that dreams and aspirations will come true with grace. God. Whoever sees in his dream that he is walking in a wheelchair, it could be a sign of ties of kinship and closeness with others thanks to God. Interpretation of the dream of walking on the bones of the dead in a dream. Whoever sees in his dream that he was walking on the bones of the dead, it could be a sign that some Difficulties will face the dreamer and he has to ask for God’s help. In the case of my personal opinion that he was walking on the bones of the dead, this may indicate a lack of funds that the dreamer may be experiencing at that time. If one sees that he was walking on the bones of the dead, this may indicate emotional emptiness Which the dreamer suffers from in those days. A person’s dream that he was walking on dead bones may indicate forbidden gains and the dreamer must repent and verify the sources of his money, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about walking on one leg in a dream In the event that a person sees that he is walking on one leg in In a dream, this may indicate after the major setbacks that occurred in his life during that period. Seeing yourself walking on one leg in a dream may indicate a lack of money or financial loss. Seeing yourself walking on one leg in a dream indicates a crisis that the dreamer is going through during This time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of not being able to walk in a dream: If one sees that he cannot walk, this may be an indication of his inability to express himself. Seeing that a person cannot walk could be a sign that he is making some mistakes in an ongoing way Seeing a person being unable to walk in a dream may indicate difficulties that the dreamer faces in his life during this period. Whoever sees in his dream that he cannot walk, it may be a sign that he has committed some sins and must repent and return to God the Most High and Blessed. Interpretation Dreaming of walking on a snake in a dream: In the event that someone sees himself walking on a snake, it may be a sign that you are overcoming some serious difficulties in your life. A dream of a person walking on a snake in a dream could be a sign that positive things are happening in our lives these days Whoever sees in his dream that he was walking on a snake in the dream, may...
